1.0.name: wordpress/longtail-keyword-browser
1.0.description:
This is a simple tool that will help you find longtail keywords. Enter your seed or root keyword and click browse. The plugin will return a navigation tree similar to folders on your computer. Open a folder and the tool will find longer keywords. I use this as a Google wonder wheel alternative.

PLEASE keep in mind this is meant to be a very simple plugin. If you rate this plugin less than 5, please tell me why in the forums so I can either help you with an issue and/or improve the plugin.

Currently only supports US and UK English.
